O'Brien agrees late night's future seems murky. I don't think anybody knows, O'Brien tells PopcornBiz. ''We don't know if late night shows are going to be a pill that you take in three years or a saline drop that goes in your eye. None of us knows.

Andy Coulson denies being aware of any wrongdoing at the paper, part of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp media group, and police said last month there was not enough evidence to charge him with any crime. Obviously when he was editor of the News of the World, bad things happened at that newspaper and when he found about those, he resigned.
